Articles.Content:
If this is the wrong place for my question, accept my apology.

What is the bottom right button in VAB? 1 technical report between and reset button. On the chat someone mentioned the wifi button and the message but that did not make me any wiser. Someone can eli5

https://www.google.com.vn/
That’s for reviewing any messages you have, such as when you visit a new planet and get science points, or complete a mission.
